title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting the importation of allome into any His Maiesties dominions
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
notes: "Giuen at Royston the tenth day of October, in the twelfth yeere of our raigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the eight and fourtieth"--Colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
